releaseNotes: We made some improvements and squashed some bugs. You just keep doing you and have fun!
description:
Get ready to be Smitten with the new, fun dating app! Say goodbye to endless swiping and hello to connecting with new people in your area who are ready to chat, date, and have some fun!

Smitten makes you feel like you are playing a game on every profile! With fun facts, quirky questions, and interactive games like the Lie Detector and the Guessary game, it's incredibly fun and easy to find the people you like.  When you match with someone, that’s when Smitten becomes your superpower. With icebreakers and instant-conversation starters, Smitten helps you get into a fun conversation without the awkwardness of cringe opening lines. The next time your friends complain about other dating apps, show them Smitten and let them try for themselves! 
Ps. When your friends join using your invite code, you both get a free Spotter to see who likes you!

DATING MADE FUN
We celebrate single life and believe dating should be fun. Smitten is the most fun dating app on the market today. It’s easy to browse through nearby singles and read through exciting profiles. Smitten profiles are packed with juicy content and personal facts if you want to get to know someone better.

DATING MADE EASY
We created icebreakers for you because we know how hard it can be to start a conversation. We made it so easy that more than 60% of matches turn into a conversation, compared to only about 10% on other dating apps. When you play a game with your match, the results from the game are posted to the chat to help you get a fun conversation going from the get-go. You can also use our new feature, The Roulette to send a random message to spice things up.

KEY FEATURES
-  Find new people: Discover new people to date, meet up or chat with on Smitten
-  Detailed Profiles: Sometimes you want more information than just a few photos and a boring bio. Add facts to your profile you didn’t even realize you wanted to know.
-  Guessary: Play the fun quiz game Guessary, where you make YES-and-NO guesses about your match.
-  Lie detector: You can tell a lot about people from the Lies they tell. The Lie Detector is a classic game of Two truths and a Lie to give you a better sense of your matches!
-  Find your Crush: Search for your crush and like them. Just type in their name, and you can see their profile.
-  Fun Fact: Read the most interesting thing about a person.
-  Top 3 lists: Get to know a person better by reading through their top lists.
-  The Roulette: If you run out of things to say, try The Roulette - which sends a random message or question that can spice up the conversation.

HOW DOES SMITTEN WORK
-  Log in with your phone number, Facebook account, or Apple ID. We take your privacy very seriously and do not share any private information
-  Fill in info about you, such as your name and age
-  Find new, single people in your neighbourhood who are ready to chat, meet, or date
-  Look through detailed profiles and like or nope people!
-  Fill out your profile with fun facts, hard (or easy) questions, photos, Guessary, top lists, and state your opinions on anything that makes you tick!

If you have read this far it’s your sign to install Smitten, meet new people and have some fun! 

For more information, read our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
Privacy Policy: https://www.websitepolicies.com/policies/view/UKDytd0d
Terms of Use: https://www.websitepolicies.com/policies/view/Djr8EQbJ

You can always reach us at hello@smittendating.com
